蛻.definition: skin cast off during molting; exuvia; to pupate; to molt; to slough; to cast off an old skin or shell

蛻化.definition: (of insects) to undergo metamorphosis; (fig.) to be transformed; to metamorphose; to become degraded

蛻皮.definition: skin cast off during molting; exuvium; to pupate; to molt; to slough; to cast off an old skin or shell

蛻變.definition: to transform; to morph; to degenerate; metamorphosis; transmutation; transformation; decay; degeneration
